subNodes.conversationText: root
What can I do for you, <FirstName>?
I'd like to ask you some questions.
What would you like to know?
Tell me again how you and my father became friends.
I've known your father since he was very young.  His mother, Jena, was a good friend of the mountain dwarves.
Continue
She and my sister were in Zorn's prison together for a few weeks.
Continue
I became close friends with her and she asked me to watch after her son if anything were to happen to her.
Continue
I tried to convince your father not to go back to Charn, but he was determined.
I know you tried, we all did.
I still have hope that Elos will reunite us once again.
Continue
Is there anything else you would like to ask?
Yes...
What would you like to know?
Not right now.
Why did you decide to focus on being a priest?
I have always had a gift, but chose to ignore it.
Continue
There were very few of us among the mountain dwarves who believed in Elos.
Continue
I was there when he saved Charn from Zorn's wrath.  It was then that I decided to become a devote follower.
Were you part of the battle?
No, I arrived too late and I was very young at the time.
Why hasn't Elos appeared lately?
That's a very complicated topic...let's just say that some have seen him.
Have you?
I have, but I am not at liberty to discuss it.
Continue
Is there anything else you would like to ask?
Yes...
What would you like to know?
Not right now.
Have you learned of any more surviving mountain dwarves?
There are very few of us left.  Most are staying in Aberfax, as you know.  My brother and I still travel quite a bit, but my sister stays in Aberfax mostly.
Continue
In our travels, we have heard stories of possible dwarven drumming coming from the Great Grimstan Mountains.
Continue
I still believe as your father, that there are others who have survived on the other side of the Great Mountains.
Continue
Maybe they escaped and have been in hiding in the Great Halls of my fathers.
Were not the Great Dwarven Halls captured by Zorn's creatures?
Yes, but there are many secret passages that my clan could have taken.
Continue
Is there anything else you would like to ask?
Yes...
What would you like to know?
Not right now.
What do you think about searching for my father, Adwen?
Finding your father has been my desire for many years now.
Continue
With the skills and size of our party, I believe that we have the best chance at success.
I agree...
Is there anything else you would like to ask?
Yes...
What would you like to know?
Not right now.
What do you think our chances are of freeing Adwen?
I'm optimistic...but I'm sure it will be our toughest challenge as of yet.
Continue
I've been there once before, after the Great Battle for Charn.
Continue
The caves and mine area leading to the castle should be heavily guarded.
I guess this is our best chance...
Is there anything else you would like to ask?
Yes...
What would you like to know?
Not right now.
Nothing right now, Balen.
Nothing right now, Balen.
